name: UpdateWebResources
description: Update web resources from local folder structure to target CRM organization.
author: Innofactor Sweden

inputs.name: prefix
inputs.label: Prefix for web resource files
inputs.helpMarkDown: The prefix must match the prefix of the existing web resource files.

inputs.name: pattern
inputs.label: Pattern file
inputs.helpMarkDown: File containing pattern of files to include and exclude in the update. _WebResources must be registered._

inputs.name: rootPath
inputs.label: Root folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Local root folder corresponding to root web resource path on CRM server.
